# Introduction {.unnumbered}

Enlightening Mathematics Book 1 is a series that consists form one work only and is intended for use at form 1-4 levels for revision purposes. Although the book is written primarily for the secondary school mathematics syllabus, it can also be useful to students undertaking similar courses both within and outside Kenya. The book precisely introduces each topic in an understandable summarized manner; incorporated with elaborate examples anticipated to exhibit simple mathematical ideas that are offered as a precursor to a wide range of questions after every topic. It ensures that even weak students can simply understand the calculations and apply the skills to the problems provided after the topic. The Model Sample Papers are articulated in a **KCSE** mode
